name: Bxllet Train
description:
Descend below the Wastes and enter the world of Bxllet Train, a supplement for the game Bxllet by Rathayibacter  (get it here https://rathayibacter.itch.io/bxllet). 

This supplement contains a small setting, in the mysterious underground Txnnels, where people ride around on trains and strange beasts stalk in the dark. It also contains two brief adventures and two classes! 

Check it out as part of the BXLLET JXM 2 collection!
